title: St. Louis Cardinals revenue 2001 to 2018
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, and finally roughly constant from 2011 to 2012.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 239.0 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 165.0 was reached at Year 2005
